entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Initializing RuntimeMetrics #105845
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Codegen should unset register assignments after defining nodes that will be used from spill temps #105837
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Potential bad codegen with `Avx2.PermuteVar8x32` #105824
    9.0.0
  • [WASM] System.Tests.UriCreateStringTests.Path_Query_Fragment #105823
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Potential bad codegen for `AVX512F.BlendVariable`/`AVX512F.BlendVariable` #105822
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(op2->GetRegNum() != targetReg) || (op1Reg == targetReg)' during 'Generate code' #105821
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `Bmi1.BitFieldExtract` #105820
  • JIT: `AdvSimd.BitwiseSelect` discards side effects #105818
  • JIT: Bad result with `AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogical` #105817
    9.0.0
  • Make `CancellationTokenSource.Token` accessible after dispose #105811
    Future
  • [WASI] make Task/Pollable registration weak ref #105810
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add MediaTypeNames.Application.Yaml #105809
  • [Help] [RISC-V] GC crash on System.Diagnostics.Tests.DiagnosticSourceTest.AllSubscriberStress #105808
  • `BasicEventSourceTests.TestsUserErrors.Test_BadEventSource_MismatchedIds_WithEtwListener` fails with `System.NullReferenceException` #105807
  • ilc doesn't trim some code referenced only from trimmed methods #105806
  • [NativeAOT-iOS] MacCatalyst fails to start/log `nativeaot.SmokeTests` tests #105804
  • Arm64/Sve: Tests for Sve.AddSaturate() are failing #105799
  • ARM64-SVE: Summary blocks contain incorrect instructions #105796
  • Field offset not being set when offset is 0 on explicit layout types. #105795
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: Regression in System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.X509ChainTests on 7/24/2024 9:00:29 AM #105819
  • QUIC fails to work after upgrading libmsquic to latest version #105788

Closed

  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests - Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #101409
    9.0.0
  • Inconsistent Behavior of System.Numerics.Complex and Other Numeric Types #105843
  • App stops responding - ExceptionCode: 80000003 (Break instruction exception) #93059
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: GC\\Features\\HeapExpansion\\plug\\plug.cmd #105211
  • AccessViolationException on LibraryImportGenerator unit test on release coreclr osx x64 Debug #104415
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: SveLoadMaskedUnOpTest.template needs more scenario #102878
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-jitstressregs] Assertion failure !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(!"Detected use of a corrupted OBJECTREF. Possible GC hole.") #72697
    9.0.0
  • Run on .NET 8 Arm64 seems to remove some parts of a conditional statement, probably only after Tier 1 JIT compilation #99954
    9.0.0
  • Antigen failure: `Assert failure: !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(pMT && pMT->Validate())` #105411
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ServiceProviderKeyedServiceExtensions.GetKeyedService(Type, object?) #105828
  • DI allows for Scoped services to be resolved from Singletons when DOTNET_ENVIRONMENT != Development #105791
  • crossgen2 fails with simple MAUI application #86727
    9.0.0
  • `PublishReadyToRun=true` significantly regresses startup time when used with `EnableCompressionInSingleFile=true` #101866
    9.0.0
  • Runtime crash with Hot Reload in `libmono-component-debugger.so` #105774
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] MONO_WASM: index out of bounds #101930
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed '!IsUnusedValue()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #105484
    9.0.0
  • Misspelling in a System.InvalidOperation Message #105801
    Future
  • JIT: `AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogical(x, 0)` throws in debug but not in release #105621
    9.0.0
  • Long running test hang: System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientTest.TestCredentialsCopyInAsyncContext #490
    Future
  • Arm64/Sve: GatherVectorWithByteOffsets fails for JitStressRegs #105568
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] 'System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_SpanSyncForceNonBlocking.SendRecv_Stream_TCP_MultipleConcurrentReceives' #87815
    Future
  • ZipArchiveEntry.Open returning a truncated stream #105797
  • System.Formats.Asn1 8.0.1 - The located assembly's manifest definition does not match the assembly reference #105248
    9.0.0
  • CI failure: Networking tests failing with 'No such host is known' #80578
    Future
  • Test hang: VirtualNetworkTest.VirtualNetwork_MultiThreadIntegrityTest_Ok #32820
    Future
  • Test hang: BasicAuthentication_InvalidRequest_SendsStatusCodeClient #29942
    Future
  • [Test failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #77726
    Future
  • List Add is way slower (almost 3 times) in `net9.0 preview 3` than with `net8.0` #101437
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 8 Regressions on 10/7/2023 2:03:18 PM #93401
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests.CertificateCallbackThrowPropagates failed #105778
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.Perf_BinaryIntegerTensorPrimitives #99123
    9.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS disk size regression on 12 Apr 2023 #85450
    Future
  • [mono][perf] iOS disk size regression on 24 Apr 2023 #85452
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 per-preview performance overview #77490
    9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Fix alphabetical order of APIs #104834
    9.0.0
  • Build break: 08: value too great for base (error token is "08") #105784
  • Test failure System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_Sync.SendRecvPollSync_TcpListener_Socket #50769
    Future
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.UnixDomainSocketTest.ConcurrentSendReceiveAsync fails #54627
    Future
  • Test failure: ConnectAsync_CancellationRequestedAfterConnect_ThrowsOperationCanceledException #56688
    Future
  • Unexpected EOF trying to read request header LoopbackServer #56798
    Future
  • Test failure: ConnectAsync_Cancel_ThrowsCancellationException #58355
    Future
  • Test hang: System.Net.Tests.SimpleHttpTests.ListenerRestart_Success #58782
    Future
  • Assembly lazy load in a Blazor WebProject with rendermode InteractiveWebAssembly #105790
  • javascript calling a method with return Task type in .net 9.0 preview6, the returned promise is always in pending state #104772
    9.0.0
  • Adding certificates to store using X509Certificate2 still fails ssl for Microsoft Ubuntu containers #105786
    Future
  • Using UnsafeAccessorAttribute throws BadImageFormatException on .NET9-preview6 #105738
  • Test failure: profiler/handles/handles/handles.sh #105125
    9.0.0
  • [x86] stress failure in RayTracer.GetNaturalColor with DOTNET_JitStress=2 #102590
    9.0.0
  • SendAsync method of System.Net.Http.HttpClient behaves differently on .NET Framework and .NET Core for a response with Content-Location header #30965

PullRequests

Created

  • Added a fix for an incorrect assumption of an assertion failure re: failure to decommit. #105849
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Clean up DiagnosticContext #105848
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Fix over-shifting logic when constant-folding `AdvSimd.ShiftRight*` #105847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetObjectData getting COM RCW/CCW #105846
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Prevent Reflection's `MakeGenericType()` from Allowing the Instantiation of Abstract Classes #105844
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [EventPipe] Handle EventPipe Enable calls during shutdown #105842
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add WebSocket Keep-Alive Ping and Timeout (minimal) implementation #105841
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Do not allow a non-keyed service to be injected to a keyed parameter #105839
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • [WASI] HTTP client testing #105838
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Increment nested depth in TooDeepJsonDocument test by 10x #105836
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix problem in ReadyToRun_TypeGenericInfoMap::HasConstraints (Recovery PR) #105835
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • JIT: Fix overzealous assert in `CodeGen::genSSE42Intrinsic` #105833
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Make sure static ctor flag check uses a volatile load #105832
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix legacy exception handling dump generation on background threads #105830
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2507128 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Diagnose beginInlining problem #105827
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Revert "Update SDK to preview 6 (#104696)" #105826
    needs-area-label
  • Emit instantiated types as external references if possible #105816
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ActivatorUtilities: Do not wrap Delegate.Invoke in another delegate #105814
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Avoid containing non-embedded conditional select #105719 #105812
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix AOT targeting .NET 6 #105805
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix opt value for an embedded intrinsic in ConditionalSelect (#105720) #105803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass FP struct fields at arbitrary offsets in ArgIterator and CallDescrWorker #105800
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use workstation GC in outerloop NativeAOT libs runs #105794
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [DRAFT] Add Keep-Alive Ping and Timeout implementation -- no Read-Ahead #105787
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [LoongArch64] Fix code generation for type conversion from float/double to uint/ulong. #105783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add/update AssemblyBuilder/PersistedAssemblyBuilder tests covering boundary / edge case scenarios #105782
    area-System.Reflection.Emit

Merged

  • [PERF] Update Android App Maui rollback generation #105763
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add missing tests for LoadVector*() #105703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix assignment for test 105484 #105834
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] wasi:http + WasiHttpHandler #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • JIT: Fix test that uses SVE intrinsic using 'nowarn' #105831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview7] Add swiftcall signature check for `mono_class_try_get_swift_error_class` #105813
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-preview7] [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging when JMC is enabled #105815
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Fixing AV on accessing source_file_list that is NULL #105781
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow explicitly implemented ISimdVector APIs to be handled as intrinsic #104983
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Fixed assertion on IsUnusedValue when creating ConditionalSelect nodes around SVE methods #105730
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove support for older LLVM versions, and re-order linker flags #105110
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Add out-of-bounds fallback for AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogical #105777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix failing tests for GatherVectorByteOffsets (#105568) #105747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Partial revert of #105301 to fix build break #105785
    area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Temporarily disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds" #105793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Check for potential store-to-load forwarding before reordering ldr -> ldp #105695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix condition to run CertificateCallbackThrowPropagates test on msquic 2.4 and higher #105789
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the add overflow check for A=A+A. #105674
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the arithmetic shift right in CodeGen::genSaveCalleeSavedRegistersHelp. #105676
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2506676 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [LoongArch64] Implement DFEATURE_EMULATE_SINGLESTEP for LA64. #105741
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Add gcinfodumper related implementation. #105740
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [browser] Marshalling of resolved Tasks/promises is not resolved in JS/C# #105464
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Automatically export '__managed__Main' when needed #105353
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • JIT: Added SVE GetFfr, SetFfr, LoadVectorFirstFaulting, GatherVectorFirstFaulting #105595
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix copy constructor injection for unsafe value classes #105779
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: Keep delegate object alive during invoke #105099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] Add Keep-Alive Ping and Timeout implementation #105672
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Heap snapshot system for WASM #105713
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Avoid scanning isinst checks when building whole program view #104148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for doubly nested intrinsic classes #105761
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Return null instead of throwing in ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationInstance\Type\Factory if a keyed service #105776
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: add missing test coverage for invalid immediate (#104809) #105677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix conditional select for Zeroing predicates (#102904) #105737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Set the initial spin count unit to 10 for DATAS. #105634
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Fixed creating generic type with abstract type when it is has a default constractor constrant #101963
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull in more places #105380
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • Fix IntelliSense for gc.cpp #105768
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert exception throwing JIT helpers to managed code. #105671
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Workaround bug in EvtFormatMessage #105762
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, 8.0.9
  • Fix flaky tests in WindowsServiceLifetimeTests #105666
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add Console.Write{Line} span overloads #105531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Update IncrementingPollingCounter only on Timer thread #105548
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [NRBF] Don't use Unsafe.As when decoding DateTime(s) #105749
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #105765
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add [DebuggerDisplay] to CancellationTokenSource #105764
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Partial re-revert of #104336. Only JIT fixes are included. #105596
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TransferEncoding chunked testing only if it is last header value #105647
    area-System.Net.Http
  • make Select_LargeNumber_Succcess exclusive #105751
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug
  • Assign latest virtual timestamp for added node to enable LRU manner of RegexCache #105746
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Keep parameter names unless DebuggerSupport is disabled #105714
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • More IR validations in HIR #105630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on Char and Rune #105773
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `Guid` #105654
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
